A total 105 chronic stroke survivor moderate severe shoulder pain enrol . All eligible participant undergo initial test injection localize pain subacromial space . If turns positive , subject randomly assign one three group : 1. low dose group receive 20mg steroid ( triamcinolone ) injection subacromial space affect shoulder ; 2. standard dose group receive standard 40mg steroid ( triamcinolone ) injection subacromial space affect shoulder ; 3. high dose group receive 60mg steroid ( triamcinolone ) injection subacromial space affect shoulder .
